Articles.Content: Can anyone say if B9 is compatible with ARM, sense it is only parts...I believe it should work with an updated, firespitter, resgen, and kintech, so more importantly does anyone know where to get the last two?
Even without those last two, if you update firespitter it shoudl work (Check the B9.23 fixes thread for more info)

Ya sorry I forgot we had that.
